Alliance.AllianceName: Free Flags in a Free World
Alliance.AllianceDescription: Lotteries, Rock and achievement 100... Jordan always... and other...

Hi Bro, Greetings From Nigeria. I know you may like to know what we do here. Well right here we offer Only Nigerian Flag As may times you may request for, All you have to do is to Support My team [b]Scorpion[/b] [b]King[/b] [teamid=2009517] and then Join the federation [federationid=113820] after that you the then make your request on How you want your flag and where you want it
All flags collectors around the world. There will be a lot of competitions and lotteries.

HERE IS EVERYTHING ALLOWED ! You are also tired to hearing say in most flag fed's 'this is not allowed'? Well here you can: Ask or BEG for flags, sell flags for bucks or for supporter packages, offer hosts, donate flags, win flags and many many more...
**To win BARBADOS flag (tradeable)**
For every hattrick member, who's interested in collecting rare flags.

Here you can find flags (with ht-flagtools.org) and other things, f.e. new logo´s
We start the announcement for our first formula 1 racing

Our philosophy is there for those of us who are intending to try to create a completely Homeground first or second team, and also for those who have been doing this for years. Eventhough when you are simply interested in learning more about the concept or you are willing to experiment you are welcome. The youth of today will be the legends of tomorrow!
We also offer the philosophy of flagtrading and rare flags. This is based on the feature of receiving country flags for playing international friendlies. We are aiming at making new friends and having a good time, worldwide!
We have weekly FREE FLAGS & flaglotteries and use ht-flagtools.
We offer Mongol Uls , Cuba , Barbados , Cambodja , Cameroon , Uganda , Mozambique , Brunei , Suriname and many more!
Discussions about tactics , line-up , training , multi-skill , youth academy are very welcome in here.
So apply , discuss , trade , win and have fun. Let's make this a fun game alltogether.
"We all love HATTRICK!"
A small fed that gives every week rare flags to the members. If you like flagchasing just become member!

FLAG CORNER - the fed for all flag chasers :-)
we'll raffle on weekly basis flags of rare countries in different types of lotteries (normal lottery, speed lottery etc.) - pl check in addition our lotteries at ht-flagtools out!
in addition we'll have other games for all members soon :-)
check FLAG CORNER out and be a part of our community soon :-)

I will give as much Mongolia Flags from my 2nd Team as possible via HT Flagtools.

Flags from around the world... trades and every week a lotery

Alliance.AllianceName: Don't loose your mind and win a flag
Alliance.AllianceDescription:
Als Mitglied dieser Föderation kannst du jede Woche seltene Flaggen gewinnen. (zum Beispiel:: Barbados, UAE, Oman, Guatemala, Malediven)
Um zu gewinnen musst du nichts weiter tun als ab und zu einen Blick in das Forum zu werfen.
---------------------------------------------------
As a member of this federation you'll have the weekly chance to win a nice flag! Just have a look at the forum!
(for example: Barbados, UAE, Oman, Guatemala, Maldives)
Just join and take your chance to win!
Free flag: - Saudi Arabia - Bangladesh

Welkom bij Botbreuk's vlaggen en federatie forum.
Het doel van de federatie is om elkaar te helpen, zoveel mogelijk mijlpalen en vlaggetjes te verzamelen.
Welcome to Botbreuk's flags and federation forum.
The goal of the federation is to help together, collect much as possible milestones and flags.

TYLKO DLA OSÓB KTÓRE MAJĄ DRUGI KLUB.
ONLY FOR USERS WITH SECOND TEAM.

In this exclusive federation you have the possibility to very easily get all supporter flags, because only 1 member of each country is allowed.
Requirements:
– You are a platinum supporter (because only platinum supporters have unlimited supporter and federation slots).
– Of course the flag of your home country counts (and not the flag of your possible second team).
– After your application has been accepted, you support all the members of the federation (that means an ideal maximum of 127).
– In return, every member of the federation will support you (that means an ideal maximum of 127 as well).
– The only flag that you won’t get in this federation, is the one of your own country, as only 1 member of each country is allowed. But it can be supposed, that you’ll have this one already. And as only 1 member of each country is allowed, it’s much more comfortable to fulfil the «duty» of supporting all the other members.
– You regularly check and support new members.

FLAGS FOR FREE !
You are chasing rare flags but nobody wants to accept your challenges? Maybe you just have to leave it up to the hands of fate and join this special federation. We are helping flag chasers from all over the world to play friendly games that are hard to get.
Let's discuss all flag related topics, chat with other flag chasers and win some rare flags.
Invite other users to join---will have extra prize with 1 year supporter platinum

Для обмена флагами и опытом! Пока что есть флаги Иордании, Йемена, Омана, Кувейта, Армении, Казахстана, Кыргызстана и Монголии.
This federation wants to help all of you to complete the Flag Collection (Yordan, Yemen, Oman, Kuwayt, Hayastan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Mongolia, ...)
The place for all flagchasers and flagdealers !

Have a rare 2nd team flag, and want to use it to your advantage? Set up here in our community and advertise your 2nd team flag in order to get flags for your first team!
Inoltre, visto che c'è un sacco di utenti italiani, offro anche una versione italiana: qua troverete uno scambio di bandiere utilizzando la vostra seconda squadra (bandiera rara) per ottenere un'altra bandiera rara per la vostra prima squadra. Iscrivetevi ai forum per pubblicizzarvi!
500 und mehr Mitglieder gesucht für mein Archievment-Point
Fellow Flag Chasers Be Welcome And Win and/or Donate Some Flags!
